CustomField.description: Days between the Certificate Review Return Date through the Send Tentative Offer Date. Zero if negative or missing dates.
CustomField.formula: IF(IF( Send_Tentative_Offer_Date__c - Certificate_Review_Return_Date__c <0,NULL,Send_Tentative_Offer_Date__c - Certificate_Review_Return_Date__c)>999,NULL,IF( Send_Tentative_Offer_Date__c - Certificate_Review_Return_Date__c <0,NULL,Send_Tentative_Offer_Date__c - Certificate_Review_Return_Date__c))
CustomField.label: # Days Tentative Offer
